So you were into track and field,

info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-运动-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content: About your favorite sport, <color=#8AAB4B>{喜欢的运动}</color>, that's right, isn't it?

content:
Gahaha~gah! Did I remember wrong?

What is it, gah?

With the ball as the central prop,
everyone takes turns being the star of the game.
What a delightful way to have fun!

content:
Just looking for that simple thrill,

from working out?

content:
So it was a sport of frolicking freely on the water stage,
In this regard, I can't feel your joy anymore,
Though I can float effortlessly,
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-运动-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Oh, so you're not into sports either?
To be honest, I'm in a similar situation, though
rather than disliking them, I just can't participate.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-运动-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Most invitations I get are to be a cheerleader from the sidelines,
playing the role of the motivational support during sports activities.
If I were to actually participate myself... I might stick out like a sore thumb.

content: No, that's not it

After all, it's our little ritual of getting to know each other,
And I truly respect that.
